brainly_data.question:
One way in which the election of 1860 was warning of the oncoming Civil War was that
A. 
Stephen Douglas won the popular vote, but lost the electoral college.
B. 
Abraham Lincoln did not receive a majority of the popular vote.
C. 
Stephen Douglas' platform called on voters to secede if he lost.
D. 
only one candidate ran against Abraham Linco
brainly_data.subject: History
